name: meth-server
description: Meth back-end server which handles sync

scripts.deploy: /bin/sh -c 'if [ "$TRAVIS_BRANCH" = "master" ]; then yarn deploy:prod; else yarn deploy:dev; fi'
scripts.release:dev: yarn deploy:dev --team meth --token $NOW_TOKEN && yarn alias --local-config deploy/now.dev.json
scripts.release:prod: yarn deploy:prod --team meth --token $NOW_TOKEN && yarn alias --local-config deploy/now.prod.json
scripts.release: /bin/sh -c 'if [ "$TRAVIS_BRANCH" = "master" ]; then yarn release:prod; else yarn release:dev; fi'

author: Ramesh Nair <ram@hiddentao.com>
